item.title: Getting started with encryption of documents
item.description:
Getting started with encryption of documents

During collaborations with others I often have to send data around or wait for (sensitive) data.

To simplify life for both parties - the sender of the document and the recipient - I have written some instructions:

Sender

Recipient
